Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: The AI Agent Development Blueprint | From Design to Production with Code
Description:
Find the code samples from this course here ➡️ https://aka.ms/BuildingAIAgents

This course will walk you through the basic steps of getting an AI Agent into production. We use the Microsoft Agent Framework and Microsoft Foundry to design, build, evaluate and deploy our AI Agents, but the fundamentals apply to any type of AI Agent you are building.

In this course: 00:00 Introduction 00:49 Agent Design 14:00 Agent Development 32:20 Agent Evaluation 45:11 Agent Deployment

Questions? Join the community Discord here: https://aka.ms/buildingagents-discord
